servinfo.title: DTC P1618: Keyless Start Control Module CAN Communication Error (for Vehicle with Keyless Start System)

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to Immobilizer Control System Wiring Circuit Diagram:For Petrol Engine Model

entry.ptxt: Reception error of communication data for keyless start control module is detected for longer than specified time continuously.

item.ptxt: CAN communication wire circuits faulty
Steering angle sensor (if equipped) faulty
Keyless start control module faulty
4WD control module (if equipped) faulty
TCM (if equipped) faulty
BCM faulty
ABS/ESP® control module faulty
Combination meter faulty
ECM faulty

test1.ptxt: Clear DTC(s) referring to Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) Clearance:For Petrol Engine Model .
Turn the ignition switch to OFF position.
Check if any DTC is detected referring to Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) Check:For Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.title: Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) check in ECM
testgroup.question: Is any DTC other than P1618 detected in Step 1?

action.ptxt: Perform the troubleshooting referring to the corresponding flowchart.

testgroup.title: Poor connection check at ECM, ABS/ESP® control module and keyless start control module connectors

test1.ptxt: With the ignition key at OFF position, check each connector and wire terminal at ECM, ABS/ESP® control module and keyless control module for secure connection.

testgroup.question: Is each connector and wire terminal connected securely?

testgroup.title: Check for open and high resistance in CAN communication wire circuits between ABS/ESP® control module and keyless start control module

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connector “E03” from ABS control module or “E53” from ESP® control module.
Disconnect connector “G42” from keyless start control module.
Measure resistance at the following wire terminals.

ptxt.emph: Vehicle equipped without ESP® control module

item.ptxt: Between “E03-12” wire terminal at ABS connector and “G42-19” wire terminal at keyless start control module connector
Between “E03-6” wire terminal at ABS connector and “G42-18” wire terminal at keyless start control module connector

ptxt.emph: Vehicle equipped with ESP® control module

item.ptxt: Between “E53-13” wire terminal at ESP® control module connector and “G42-19” wire terminal at keyless start control module connector
Between “E53-44” wire terminal at ESP® control module connector and “G42-18” wire terminal at keyless start control module connector

testgroup.question: Is each resistance 1 Ω or less?

action.ptxt: Repair open or high resistance in malfunctional wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for short between CAN communication wire circuits between ABS/ESP® control module and keyless start control module

test1.ptxt: Measure resistance at the following wire terminals.

ptxt.emph: Vehicle equipped without ESP® control module

item.ptxt: Between “E03-12” wire terminal at ABS control module connector and “G42-18” wire terminal at keyless start control module connector.
Between “E53-13” wire terminal at ESP® control module connector and “G42-18” wire terminal at keyless start control module connector

testgroup.question: Is resistance infinite?

action.ptxt: Repair short between CAN communication wire circuits.

testgroup.title: Check for short to ground wire circuit in CAN communication wire circuits

test1.ptxt: Measure resistance at the following wire terminals.

item.ptxt: Between “E03-6” wire terminal at ABS control module connector and body ground
Between “E03-12” wire terminal at ABS control module connector and body ground
Between “E53-13” wire terminal at ESP® control module connector and body ground
Between “E53-44” wire terminal at ESP® control module connector and body ground

testgroup.question: Is resistance infinite?

action.ptxt: Repair short to ground wire circuit in CAN communication wire circuits.

testgroup.title: Check for short to power supply wire circuit in CAN communication wire circuits

test1.ptxt: Measure resistance at the following wire terminals with the ignition switch at ON position.

item.ptxt: Between “E03-6” wire terminal at ABS control module connector and body ground
Between “E03-12” wire terminal at ABS control module connector and body ground
Between “E53-13” wire terminal at ESP® control module connector and body ground
Between “E53-44” wire terminal at ESP® control module connector and body ground

testgroup.question: Is voltage 0 V?

action.ptxt: Repair short to power supply wire circuit in CAN communication wire circuits.

testgroup.title: Check of keyless start control module power and ground wire circuits

test1.ptxt: Check keyless start control module power and ground wire circuits referring to Keyless Start Control Module Power and Ground Circuit Check .

testgroup.question: Are they in normal?

action.ptxt: Replace keyless start control module with a known-good one and recheck.
